en-US: Please use a desktop or laptop computer to access this application. If you are using that and still seeing this message, you need to resize your window to be larger enough. The application is unable to run without sufficient window size. Note: Touch input is not supported at this time, mouse operation is recommended.
zh-CN: 请使用台式机或笔记本电脑访问此应用程序。如果您正在使用该设备但仍然看到此消息，则需要将窗口调整为足够大。没有足够的窗口大小，应用程序无法运行。温馨提示：目前暂不支持触摸输入，建议使用鼠标操作。
